item.title: Games Development ToolSet GitHub 2.0
item.description:
This is a new blog for the development of the Games Toolshelf for Houdini. We will use this space for posting quick blurbs about what we’re thinking, or maybe little discoveries we are making as we develop these tools.

The idea is to use github as a staging and development area for new Games Focused tools in Houdini. As tools mature we will bring them into the main Houdini build.

This gives us flexibility to try different quick tools and see which ones the users will find useful, as well as let the tools be production hardened with a tight delivery loop for fixes.

Our upcoming priorities will be bugfixes and error reporting in the current tools and then initial research into future features.
